title: Bitdefender Family Pack - 15 Devices | 2 year Subscription | PC/Mac | Activation Code by email
description: Bitdefender Family Pack is complete protection for Windows, macOS, iOS and Android. With automatic updates and upgrades, Bitdefender Family Pack gives you the most innovative technologies that predict, prevent, detect and remediate the latest cyber-threats, including malware and ransomware. Family Pack brings network-based protection, prevents exploitation of vulnerabilities in your system, and detects and blocks brute-force attempts and botnet attacks from compromising your devices while keeping your sensitive information safe. Sophisticated parental controls allow you to protect your children online, filter content, limit screen time, and even track location.
